# CMRecordedAccelerometerData

**Class**

A single piece of accelerometer data that was recorded by the device.

## Declaration

```swift
class CMRecordedAccelerometerData
```

## Overview

You do not create instances of this class directly. Instead, you use a [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMSensorRecorder] object to retrieve already recorded data from the system.

## Getting the Accelerometer Data

- **startDate**: The wall clock time when the sensor sample was recorded.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the accelerometer data.

## Accelerometers

- **Getting raw accelerometer events**: Retrieve data from the onboard accelerometers.
- **CMAccelerometerData**: A data sample from the device’s three accelerometers.
- **CMSensorRecorder**: An object that gathers and retrieves accelerometer data from a device.
- **CMSensorDataList**: A list of the accelerometer data recorded by the system.

## Inherits From

- CMAccelerometerData

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
